content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0)

### Second Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 0.0)

### New Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 2.0)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position 2.0, 2.0)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace. You encountered errors when trying to insert iron ore into the first furnace when you had none available in your inventory.
- You faced issues inserting coal into the second furnace due to insufficient coal in your inventory.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Be aware of the furnace status before extracting items. If the furnace result is full or has no ingredients, you will not be able to extract more items until some are removed or ingredients are added.

### Errors when using resources
- When harvesting resources, ensure you are aware of the nearest resource positions to minimize travel time and maximize efficiency.

### Errors with undefined entities
- Ensure that all entities are properly defined before attempting to use them. You encountered an error when trying to insert items into a 'new_stone_furnace' that was not defined in your previous context.
